html:
11.20.23  6:05 pm   If you must travel from somewhere whose name starts with an "H" to another with a name beginning with an "O", what will those two places be in your opinion, considering that they both lie in North America?

      how about H street, in anchorage alaska, to Old Town in key west florida

11.20.23  5:46 pm   its my birthday today, now that im older what do i do?

      you're still not old enough. try getting older again, tomorrow

11.20.23  3:05 pm   do u like Comic sans?

      it's good sometimes as comic relief

11.20.23  2:43 pm   how to make learning much more fun if i hate it?

      the answer is almost too obvious, i feel stupid to say it. switch to learning something you like

11.20.23  2:02 pm   Is anime over yet

      if it is, i'll bring it back

11.20.23  12:40 pm   if time is money are you stealing my money

      no

11.20.23  11:56 am   Can you believe it's margarine?

      i would probably be fairly gullible about that, because i don't really know what margarine is

11.20.23  11:19 am   whats your favorite day of the year

      january 1

11.20.23  9:28 am   is there a trick to quickly learning a piano piece?

     i'm not sure. i've never really learned that type of thing

     or do i have to do it slowly 10000 times first no matter what, before im able to?

     you're able to start learning immediately. and actually you'll never finish learning

11.20.23  8:37 am   accidentally put a neutron star inside the bangladeshi prime minister's sandwich.

     i believe you

     what do i do?

     you've already done the thing

11.20.23  8:31 am   What do you think will happen when

      i can't predict

11.20.23  2:11 am   if one were to try to measure personal success within the life-pursuit-of-art, is it possible to measure it solely by internal metrics (ie I am better at it than I have ever been), or is one compelled to seek outside measures of success (ie more people like the art now than ever before). ? thanks

      measurement itself is an art. there's as many ways to measure things as there are to make the things

11.20.23  1:43 am   How's that magnum opus coming along?

      i don't do magnum opuses. i'm just not that kind of guy

11.20.23  1:20 am   I may have accidentally joined a cult. What should I do?

      join a second cult, and then merge the two

11.20.23  12:28 am   are rectangles cool?

      they are almost the coldest thing there is

11.19.23  9:01 pm   is the place half full or half empty?

      this is known as 'at 50% capacity'

11.19.23  7:59 pm   favorite painting?

      that 1 out of every 32 bob ross paintings takes place in florida instead of alaska

11.19.23  7:51 pm   what's your favourite spanish word?

      español

11.19.23  5:22 pm   if scientists discovered a new color and you were supposed to name it, what would you name it?

      nothing until i see it

11.19.23  4:00 pm   If I told people my music sucks, would they have higher chance of listening to it than if I told them it was good?

      i think slightly yes. it just sounds like a more interesting plan to 'listen to music that sucks' than to 'listen to music that is good'

11.19.23  3:27 pm   why are my dreams scary?

      i was going to say it's the lack of object permanence, but then i realized that actually some of the most scary ones have it

11.19.23  2:30 pm   If the person in the orange shirt from "Perfect" can't go up, then how was he perched on top of the sign?

      i have no idea

11.19.23  1:29 pm   random number from 1 to 1

      1

11.19.23  10:15 am   any advice on how to make a video?

      no. no one knows how to do that

11.19.23  10:14 am   how to exist? help I need this advice now 

      you are doing it very well. you should be the one actually giving advice

11.19.23  10:06 am   What is the derivative of √(2x-e^x)/(sin(x)+1) ?

      i don't know

11.19.23  6:04 am   thoughts on the incoherent gen alpha slang

      your thoughts are that it is incoherent. that's the only thing i know about it in this context

11.19.23  5:44 am   my name's inspector stongby and i was born in july

      i believe you

11.19.23  3:17 am   how often do people ask you about drugs

      not often

11.19.23  2:45 am   how many places have you been to?

      if you add up all the places i've ever been to, it adds up to half a place

11.19.23  12:39 am   how do i reconcile with a friend

      the first question is of course how did things get unconciled

11.18.23  10:32 pm   bill do u know why does nature make sinewaves?

     why wouldn't it

      or why any wave can be broken down (approximately) into sums of sines?

     i'm not sure. i actually hadn't heard about that. i've never looked into it, but i think i'd like to at some point

     I cant really find anywhere on the internet that explains WHY, just that it is. If i throw a stone into the water, does it ripple sinusoidally? Why though? why not like a triangle wave? what is it about nature that makes it want to be siney?

     my first thought is that transfers of energy into different vectors naturally happen gradually and not instantly. that's just my experience with acceleration, or just direction-change in general. however, that doesn't necessarily answer the question of why our universe is like this in the first place. although i've grown accustomed to it being that way and it seems normal. but i could also see it being normal the other way also. like how color changes in a photo are usually gradual, but you could also imagine a universe with only 2 colors and no gradients, and that would make its own kind of sense

     Is it really that way or is the sine wave just a good way to represent stuff? I saw an argument that it is used because its derivative is also siney but im not sure if thats it. Does nature speak sine or do we make sense of it through sine?

     it's been said that nature speaks calculus. this may be tangentially related to your argument

     I don't really know what to ask online to try and understand what void there is in my understanding of it. I know that it represents the movement of a circle, but does it mean that nature is naturally circular?

     circles are natural, i'll give you that

     and thats why when translated into one dimension we see sines? 

     that seems solid, except i think you'd still have to call it 2 dimensions. but it's just perpendicular straight dimensions instead of the radial thing

11.18.23  8:00 pm   how to grow a potato

      plant a potato

11.18.23  7:55 pm   Does corn fish can exist?

      seems likely

11.18.23  7:39 pm   If you could put any song of yours into any feature film, what song and what film?

      i'd put many songs in many films. i'd make the films and the songs. except the video component would not actually be on film, unless i happen to be living in a time period where film is commonly used as a video medium

11.18.23  3:57 pm   I love to create parse trees of stuff but I never finish any of the ones I make

      that's probably because parse trees are usually infinite, when correct

11.18.23  2:44 pm   what makes something funny?

      nothing makes anything funny. that's why it's hilarious when something does

11.18.23  1:51 pm   when is a good time to wash my soap?

      right now

11.18.23  12:13 pm   Have you tried sleeping on the ceiling?

      no

11.18.23  11:29 am   how to prove i exist?

      you've already done it, many times over

11.18.23  4:01 am   Do you think it's important for people to not be naive and know how the world works?

      learning is fun. that's all i really think i know

11.18.23  3:43 am   lf dogs could fly, what would birds do?

      the first thing they would probably do is notice

11.18.23  2:43 am   what's your language learning process like

      listen to genuine conversations i enjoy. sometimes allow myself to be curious about what things mean. and sometimes try my best to transcribe it. then, once i have a piece of content figured out, it's nice to then incorporate it into the backdrop of casual listening. that being said, language learning is not my fulltime priority right now. in fact it's barely even part time. my main priority these days is working on and developing audio-visual content for your viewing and listening enjoyment

11.18.23  2:33 am   Is the "I'm feeling rare" button a reference to steak?

      no, and it also doesn't say that

11.18.23  2:17 am   do you think the universe is local or real or neither?

      could be both

11.18.23  2:04 am   How can I be proud of my accomplishments knowing I've benefitted from an unbelievable amount of privilege and good luck 

      maybe you'll just have to accomplish even more than you already have done

11.18.23  12:41 am   can you tell me your favorite idiom?

      no, because that would undersell the importance of changing from idiom to idiom

11.17.23  10:52 pm   Could you answer the next question with a haiku? thanks if yes

      no

11.17.23  10:48 pm   so far I've kept my new year's resolution to ask a question here every day! (no I haven't)

      that's refreshing to hear someone talking about new year's resolutions in november. it's almost as if they were actually meant to be for a year, and not just the first half of january

11.17.23  10:24 pm   What's a hotdog?

      i have no earthly idea
